body_html:
I think you might need to add external dependencies to third_party somewhere here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/CMakeLists.txt
and possibly a .cmake for lmdb in external/ to keep it clean.

I think you might need to add external dependencies to third_party somewhere here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/CMakeLists.txt
and possibly a .cmake for lmdb in external/ to keep it clean.
body:
I think you might need to add external dependencies to third_party somewhere here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/CMakeLists.txt
and possibly a .cmake for lmdb in external/ to keep it clean.
